channel.title: Zooplankton on Wu-Jung Lee @APL-UW
channel.description: Recent content in Zooplankton on Wu-Jung Lee @APL-UW

item.title: Scooping up zooplankton from the ocean
item.description: This is my second time sailing with the OOI Cabled Array team from UW APL and the School of Oceanography, with a mission to scoop up some zooplankton from the ocean. These zooplankton samples will serve as verification data – or “ground truth” – for the cabled Bio-acoustic Sonars (ZPLSC-B) on the OOI Endurance Array. On Leg 4 of VISIONS’18, we only had time to visit the Oregon offshore cabled site, so that’s where we towed.
